### Back Propagation
---

<div style="text-align: center">
<img src="data:image/png;base64," width="427" height="121" style="cursor:pointer;" onclick="(function(img){if(img.wnd!=null&&!img.wnd.closed){img.wnd.focus();}else{var r=function(evt){if(evt.data=='ready'&&evt.source==img.wnd){img.wnd.postMessage(decodeURIComponent(img.getAttribute('src')),'*');window.removeEventListener('message',r);}};window.addEventListener('message',r);img.wnd=window.open('https://www.draw.io/?client=1&lightbox=1&edit=_blank');}})(this);"/>
</div>

假設一個簡單兩顆神經元$x_{1}, x_{2}$的神經網路，對於每顆神經元的更新$\frac{ \partial C}{ \partial w_{i}}$，可以分為`Forward Pass`及`Backward Pass`兩個步驟，`Forward Pass`非常容易計算，而`Backward`則是須從最後一層推回來，故得其名

$$ Y = \sigma (Z) $$

$$ Z = WX + B = w_{1}x_{1} + w_{2}x_{2} + b $$

$$ w \textit{更新權重:  } \frac{ \partial z}{ \partial w} \frac{ \partial C}{ \partial z} $$

$$ \textit{Forward Pass:  } \frac{ \partial z}{ \partial w} = x $$

$$ \textit{Backward Pass:  } = \frac{ \partial C}{ \partial z} = \frac{ \partial y}{ \partial z} \frac{ \partial C}{ \partial y} = 
{ \sigma(z) }' \frac{ \partial C}{ \partial y}
$$

$$ { \sigma(z) }' = ({ \frac{1}{1 + e^{-z}} })' = \frac{e^{-z}}{(1+e^{-z})^{2}} = \sigma(z) (1 - \sigma(z))$$

$$ \frac{ \partial C}{ \partial y} = \frac{ \partial Loss }{ \partial y} $$

### Loss Function
---

根據不同`Loss Function`，$ \frac{ \partial C}{ \partial y} $的形式有所不同，也會影響模型參數訓練的過程

$$ \textit{Cross Entropy} = \frac{1}{N} \sum_{n=1}^{N} \hat{y}^{(n)} \ln y^{(n)} + (1 - \hat{y}^{(n)} ) \ln (1 - y^{(n)} ) $$

$$ \frac{ \partial C}{ \partial y^{(i)}} = \frac{1}{N} (- \frac{\hat{y}^{(i)}}{y^{(i)}} + \frac{1 - \hat{y}^{(i)}}{1 - y^{(i)}}) $$


### Reference
